price: A kako i ne bi znao Onaj Koji stvara, Koji zna i ono što je najsitnije, Onaj Koji u potpunosti sve zna!
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
